source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_00<tab>Stacia appears to be in need of your assistance.
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_00<tab>コールドウィンド島のスタシアは、冒険者を探していたようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_01<tab>Stacia explains that Diabolos and his minions have been spotted amongst the clouds, but Leofard and Cait Sith are unable to agree on the best way to conduct a search for the voidsent's elusive lair. She requests that you visit the sky pirates' aerial roost, and add your perspective to the debate. Use the Redbill standard to travel to the Parrock, and seek out Stacia.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_01<tab>前回までの冒険録：
第六霊災で滅んだ魔法都市マハの住人が造り上げた、雲海に浮かぶ船「魔航船」。空賊レオファードとともに、魔航船の踏破に成功した冒険者だが、妖異ディアボロスにより、船の動力とされていた大妖異、女王スカアハの眠る「棺」が何処かに転送されてしまう。魔航船を追うための道具「雲風の羅針盤」を奪っていった空賊団「大鷲連合」の動向も警戒しつつ、レオファード率いる空賊団「レッドビル」は、ケット・シーとともに「棺」の捜索に乗り出すのだった。
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
スタシアは、「レッドビル」のアジトへ向かってほしいという。彼らのアジトであるパロック繋留基地に向かい、「スタシア」と合流しよう。パロック繋留基地へは、アバラシア雲海のコールドウィンド島に立つ「レッドビル」の旗から向かうことができるようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_02<tab>You have arrived safely at the Parrock. Enter Leofard's private quarters and speak with the Redbill captain.
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_02<tab>無事にスタシアと合流できた。アバラシア雲海のコールドウィンド島に立つ「レッドビル」の旗から、パロック繋留基地に向かい、レオファードの私室で「レオファード」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_03<tab>Although his argument with Cait Sith is hardly concluded, Leofard refuses to discuss the matter any further. The captain seems ready to dismiss you as well, then suddenly remembers a problem plaguing Utata with which you may be able to assist. Make your way to the Gauntlet, and see what can be done to aid the troubled engineer.
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_03<tab>レオファードとケット・シーの論争は、ひとまずおさまったようだ。「レッドビル」の技師ウタタが、魔航船のことで悩んでいるらしい。アバラシア雲海のガントレット諸島で「ウタタ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_04<tab>You find Utata almost sobbing over the apparent failure of her newly built ectocompass. After hearing the painstaking process behind its construction, however, Cait Sith theorizes that the issue lies not with the device, but with the location of the energy the device is tracking. Almost coinciding with her realization that she now holds a reliable method for hunting down Diabolos, Utata receives an urgent call from Stacia. It seems that a number of Talon airships are on an approach course to the Parrock. Return to the Redbills' roost, and speak with Leofard.
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_04<tab>ウタタが作った「雲風の羅針盤」は、魔航船に潜んでいた妖異の居場所を指し示してるのかもしれない。この推論に沸き立つ一同のもとに、パロック繋留基地に「大鷲連合」の飛空艇が迫っているとの連絡が届いた。アバラシア雲海のコールドウィンド島に立つ「レッドビル」の旗から、パロック繋留基地に向かい、「レオファード」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_05<tab>You arrive back at the Parrock to find a pair of weary and disheveled Talons with a woeful tale to tell. It seems that Radlia and her crew were directed by the stolen ectocompass to the ruins of Mhach, where they were ambushed by nightmarish voidsent. The Talons then beg Leofard to rescue Radlia from the fiends, a request to which he agrees after learning of the existence of a powerful artifact hidden within the remnants of the city. Join the Redbill captain back in his private quarters, and help decide your next move.
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_05<tab>「大鷲連合」の主力部隊は、妖異によって壊滅してしまってたらしい。アバラシア雲海のコールドウィンド島に立つ「レッドビル」の旗から、パロック繋留基地に向かい、レオファードの私室で「レオファード」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_06<tab>According to Cait Sith, the Nullstone─an artifact capable of obliterating even the most powerful voidsent─was left behind to sink with the doomed city of Mhach. With the ruins now exposed, however, the feline familiar reasons that it will only be a matter of time before Diabolos and his minions break through the wards protecting the relic. Lured by the prospect of loot and adventure, Leofard lays down a plan to rescue Radlia and snatch the artifact from under the fiends' noses. Head out to the Parrock airship landing and speak with the Redbill captain when you are ready to fly.
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_06<tab>ケット・シーによれば、かつてマハの都市があった遺跡には、妖異を消滅させる力を持つ「要」が眠っているらしい。「大鷲連合」のラドリアを救出し、マハの都市に眠る「要」を手に入れるため、「レッドビル」も、ヤフェーム湿地を目指すことを決める。アバラシア雲海のコールドウィンド島に立つ「レッドビル」の旗から、パロック繋留基地に向かい、「レオファード」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_07<tab>Though it took the promise of treasure to persuade him, Leofard has agreed to attempt the rescue of Captain Radlia from the clutches of the voidsent. While he and his crew search for the lost Talons, you have been tasked with carving a path through to the heart of the Mhachi ruins. You must retrieve the Nullstone before Diabolos, or risk forfeiting a potent weapon in the battle against your demonic foe.

※The Weeping City of Mhach can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_07<tab>レオファードは、ラドリアの捜索を受け持ってくれるらしい。「要」を手に入れるため、禁忌都市マハを踏破しよう。
 
※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_08<tab>You have survived your foray into the heart of the Weeping City. Make your way back to the Parrock.
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_08<tab>「禁忌都市マハ」を攻略した。アバラシア雲海のコールドウィンド島に立つ「レッドビル」の旗から、パロック繋留基地へ戻ろう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_09<tab>In the highest chambers of the Mhachi ruins, you defeat an immortal guardian of questionable sanity to release the precious Nullstone. Just as Cait Sith claims the artifact, however, the voidsent Ferdiad appears. The cackling fiend taunts you with a captive Radlia, and threatens to harm the Talon captain if you do not surrender the relic. While Leofard distracts the voidsent by feigning disinterest in Radlia's well-being, Cait Sith moves into position to smite Ferdiad with the Nullstone. The scorched voidsent flees with promises of vengeance, and you exit the ruins with both Radlia and the Mhachi artifact in your possession. Speak with Leofard on the Parrock airship landing, and celebrate the success of your mission.
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_09<tab>「要」を狙って現れた妖異フェルディアを退却させ、ラドリアの救出に成功した。アバラシア雲海のコールドウィンド島に立つ「レッドビル」の旗から、パロック繋留基地に向かい、「レオファード」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_10<tab>Leofard praises you for your heroic contribution, but seems unimpressed by the potency of the Nullstone. Cait Sith explains that he has yet to learn how to unleash the relic's full potential, and points to Radlia's rescue as proof of the Nullstone's usefulness even at a fraction of its true power. Surprisingly, Leofard agrees with the feline's assessment, and even compliments Cait Sith for taking advantage of his bluff. It seems that shared danger has softened the captain's attitude towards the Mhachi familiar...
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SEQ_10<tab>レオファードと話した。レオファードは、ケット・シーが無言のままに作戦を理解したことを称賛した。ふたりの距離も、これで少し近づいたかもしれない。ラドリアが目覚めた後のことを相談するため、改めて、パロック繋留基地のレオファードと話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I was just about to fly out to Ishgard and track you down.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_000<tab>あら、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>じゃない！
会えてよかった、あなたを探していたところだったの……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_001<tab>You remember Cait Sith, that Mhachi familiar? We've been workin' with him on a plan to find Diabolos and the Queen's Coffin.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_001<tab>私たちが、マハの使い魔「ケット・シー」と取り組んでいる、
妖異ディアボロスと女王スカアハの「棺」の捜索……。
それについて、あなたにも意見を聞きたいのよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_002<tab>There've been voidsent sightin's from pirates all over, so we know that bat-winged bugger is hidin' someplace in the sky─we just don't know exactly <var 1A 02 /var>where<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_002<tab>雲海での妖異の目撃情報は、日に日に増しているわ。
妖異は、この雲海の何処かに潜んでいるはずなんだけど……。
肝心の「棺」の行方が、さっぱりでねえ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_003<tab>And as for goin' about pinpointin' the location, Leofard and the feline are bickerin' over just exactly <var 1A 02 /var>how<var 1A 01 /var>...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_003<tab>しかも、それが原因で、今後の捜索方法について、
レオファードとケット・シーが対立しちゃったの……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_004<tab>That's where you come in. If you've a spare moment or two, we could use a third opinion to break the stalemate.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_004<tab>悪いんだけど、私たちのアジト「パロック繋留基地」まで来て、
レオファードから、話を聞いてあげてくれないかしら……。
彼らも、あなたの意見なら聞き入れるでしょうし。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_005<tab>Besides all that, Leofard's eager to have another hand to help in the search, so come on over to the Parrock as soon as you're able. You know the way from here, don't you?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_005<tab>……あ、それとレオファードから伝言。
「いちいち探すのも面倒だ、今後はお前が顔を出せ」ですって！
あなたも、この旗からアジトへの航路はわかるでしょう？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_010<tab>Come on over to the Parrock when you've a spare moment. I'm tired of hearin' those two arguin', and that's the gods' honest truth...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_010<tab>悪いんだけど、私たちのアジト、
「パロック繋留基地」まで来てくれないかしら……。
あなたも、この旗からアジトへの航路はわかるでしょう？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_100_010<tab>Thanks for comin'. The captain and the cat are inside, still havin' their “discussion.” Talk to Leofard, will you, before I strangle the both of them.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_100_010<tab>来てくれてありがとう。
ふたりは中で話し合って……いえ、罵りあっているみたい。
「レオファード」から、話を聞いてあげて。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_015<tab>Like squabblin' children, the pair of them. Help Leofard settle this, would you?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_015<tab>いい大人と、いいお爺さまが、ホントみっともない……。
「レオファード」の話を聞いてあげてくれる？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_018<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! A rational mind such as yours is most welcome! Pray reason with this wind-addled brigand!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_018<tab>おお！　<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿！
お主も、この大たわけを説得してくれぬか！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_020<tab>If you're here to ask about the Queen's Coffin then you'd best turn around and walk straight out again. This aggravatin' furball's turned my mood sour as month-old aldgoat milk.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_020<tab>……「棺」の捜索状況を聞きにきたんなら、無駄足だぜ。
俺は、この偏屈ネコじじいに絡まれてイライラしてんだ。
ほれ……さっさと帰んな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_021<tab>Leofard! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s come all this way to help us─at <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> request, I might add! <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> deserves to hear where we stand on the search, at least!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_021<tab>……せっかく来てくれたっていうのに、その態度はなに？
私たちの「仲間」に、状況をきちんと説明なさい！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_022<tab>...The “search” is givin' me ulcers, is what it is. By all reports, Diabolos is lurkin' somewhere in the heavens, buildin' up his forces. But the sky is a vast dome, as high as the ocean is deep, and we've not the pirates to scour every damn floatin' rock.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_022<tab>…………捜索は、難航している。
敵は、雲海のどこかに潜んで、勢力を拡大してるようなんだが、
雲海をシラミ潰しに探せるほど、うちの規模も大きくねえんでな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_023<tab>That's when I tried my luck with Radlia. You remember her, don't you? Captain of the Talons? Blonde hair? One eye? Stole our bloody compass?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_023<tab>それと、空賊団「大鷲連合」のラドリアは覚えてるか？
俺が、リンクパールを仕込んでおいたことに気づかず、
魔航船を指し示す「雲海の羅針盤」を奪ったバカ女だが……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_024<tab>Well I've been eavesdroppin' with that linkpearl I slipped into the casin', hopin' to catch somethin' useful. But all I've heard from her and her sorry crew is snorin', grumblin', and japes about the archbishop's holy nethers.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_024<tab>連中も、魔航船を追っているようだったんで、
情報が得られるかと盗聴をつづけちゃいるが、これも空振り。
聞けたのは、航行中につきものの下世話な冗談くらいだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_025<tab>In the end, it seems we've no choice but to do this the hard way...but a certain mewlin' annoyance refuses to acknowledge the truth of it.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_025<tab>結果、地道に雲海を捜索するしかない……って状況なんだが、
そこで、このネコじじいがギャンギャン騒ぎだしてな……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_026<tab>You cannot possibly hope to investigate the entire sky with this meager handful of ne'er-do-wells! I find my suggestion to seek aid from your fellow pirate gangs a perfectly reasonable one under the circumstances!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_026<tab>広大な雲海を、この空賊団だけで捜索できるわけがない！
なれば他の空賊団にも、捜索への協力を求めるべき……。
そう提案するのは、当然のことであろう！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_027<tab>Ah, stow it, you mangy alley cat! You've not the faintest idea of how sky pirates operate! Best case scenario, we'd be locked into a deal to hand over any treasure we find─and that's assumin' we weren't laughed out of the room to begin with!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_027<tab>……ったく！　空賊のことを何も理解してねぇくせに喚くな！
空賊は自由が信条でな、そうそう他人とつるむことはない。
膨大な見返りを要求されるか、鼻で笑われるのがオチだ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_028<tab>You cannot assume that every man and woman shares your base morality! If we but made the attempt, I am sure we could convince some few of the nobility of our cause!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_028<tab>貴様の下卑た思考を、他者にまで当てはめるでない。
この崇高な使命を理解し協力してくれる者は、必ずいる！

source:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_029<tab>And so it goes, 'round and 'round...
Knowin' pirates as I do, I find myself sidin' with the captain on this. But what of you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Any thoughts on the matter?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_029<tab>もう、ずっとこんな感じ……。
私も空賊だし、どうにも意見がレオファードに偏っちゃって。
ねえ、客観的に見て、あなたはどう思う？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_Q2_000_000<tab>What are your thoughts on the matter?
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_Q2_000_000<tab>どちらの意見に賛同する？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_A2_000_001<tab>We should handle this ourselves.
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_A2_000_001<tab>自分たちだけで十分だ

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_A2_000_002<tab>We should seek aid from other crews.
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_A2_000_002<tab>他の空賊に協力を要請するべきだ

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_A2_000_003<tab>(Keep your silence.)
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_A2_000_003<tab>答えない

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_030<tab>See there!? Even <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> agrees with me. We proceed as we have been, and try to cover as much sky as possible.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_030<tab>ほーれ！　<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>も俺に賛成だ。
そうと決まれば、方針はこれまでとは変えずにいく。
今後は、いかに捜索を効率化するかを検討するぞ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_035<tab>What!? You're sidin' with the furball!? I would've thought you'd learned a thing or two about sky pirates by now...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_035<tab>嘘だろ、お前までネコじじいの味方すんのかよ。
空賊のことを、もっと理解してもらいたいもんだぜ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_040<tab>Hmph. Seems that even the great Warrior of Light has no simple solutions for this problem.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_040<tab>……はぁ、様々な無理難題を、
その手腕で片付けてきた冒険者だって、悩むこともあるか。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_045<tab>...However we tackle things, though, we've a long road ahead of us. I'll see if I can't think up a better way to shorten it.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_045<tab>……いずれにせよ、いますぐ進むような話じゃねえ。
この話は、いったんここまでだ……。
現状の打開策は、俺がちゃんと考えておく。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_046<tab>You might as well head back to your adventures, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...unless you're willin' to lend us your experience in another matter, that is.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_046<tab>ま、そんな状況なんで、お前の出番はまだ先なんだが……
……そうだな、せっかくアジトまで足を運んでくれたんだ。
ちょいと、頼みを聞いてくれや。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_047<tab>Utata, our chief engineer, has been mumblin' about the Void Ark and cursin' under her breath for days. Might be as you can provide some insight into her dilemma.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_047<tab>うちの腕利き技師「ウタタ」が、最近ずっと唸ってるんだ。
どうも、魔航船について気になることがあるらしい……。
「アバラシア雲海」にいるから、話を聞いてみてくれねぇか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_048<tab>She is conducting her research in the Sea of Clouds, yes? Well, I should rather discuss the properties of the Void Ark than continue with this fruitless debate! I shall see you down there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_048<tab>……魔航船が関係することなら、私もそちらに向かおう。
ここで大たわけと論議するよりも、有益なようだからな！！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_055<tab>Leofard is right in not trustin' aught to our fellow pirates, but we could spend years trawlin' through the clouds. There has to be some other way...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_055<tab>おなじ空賊としては、レオファードの意見に賛成だけど……
私たちだけでは、捜索に時間がかかりすぎるのも確か。
うまい打開策を見つけなくちゃね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_060<tab>Head into the Sea of Clouds and see what's botherin' Utata. Might be as you can shed some light on her problem.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_060<tab>うちの腕利き技師「ウタタ」が、最近ずっと唸ってるんだ。
どうも、魔航船について気になることがあるらしい……。
「アバラシア雲海」にいるから、話を聞いてみてくれねぇか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_065<tab>While waiting for word on Diabolos, I have been spending my time learning to pilot the Redbills' little airships. Thankfully, it seems I've mastered enough of the basics to manage this little jaunt.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_065<tab>アジトで情報を待つ時間を利用して、
飛空艇の操舵方法を習っておいて、正解だったようだな……。
この程度の距離ならば、私の腕でも航行は可能ということか。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_066<tab>Hmmm, mayhap I could make contact with some other pirates without Leofard's mediation...
Ah, but let us first address Mistress Utata's woes, shall we?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_066<tab>あの大たわけは無視して、いっそ私自ら空賊に呼びかけを……。
……いや、先のことはさておき、まずは「ウタタ」殿と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_071<tab>What troubles you, Mistress Utata? We were told that some matter regarding the Void Ark was causing you no small measure of grief...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_071<tab>どうかしたのかね、ウタタ殿……。
なにやら、魔航船に関することで悩んでおると聞いたが？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_072<tab>Mistress Utata! What are you─ Oof! Urk!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_072<tab>ウ、ウタタどの！　は、はにゃひへ……！！
はにゃ！　ふ、ふにゃーーーーーーーー！！！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_073<tab>Ah, I feel so much better now!
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_073<tab>はぁ～、すっきりした！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_074<tab>My apologies, Cait Sith. You had the misfortune to enter my field of view just as I felt the intense desire to squeeze something warm and furry.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_074<tab>……悪かったよ、どうにも行き詰まってたところに、
丁度いいモフモフが目に入ってきたんで、つい憂さ晴らしをね。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_075<tab>It's this damnable ectocompass...
I made another one, you see, identical in all respects to the first compass that Radlia stole.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_075<tab>悩みの種は、魔航船を追うために作った「霊風の羅針盤」さ……。
最初に作ったのは、こないだラドリアに奪われちまったから、
そっくりおなじものを、作りなおしたんだけど……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_076<tab>But look! It points in a completely different direction to where the Void Ark should currently be! I don't understand what I did wrong! I used the same plans, the same parts...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_076<tab>こいつが、実際の魔航船の位置と全然違う方角を指すんだ！
前に作ったときと、おなじ設計図と部品で組み立てたのに、
何故うまく機能しないのかが、わからなくて……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_077<tab>I can imagine that would be infuriating. And you are certain there are no flaws in the design or the materials?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_077<tab>……ふ、ふむ、それは確かに異なことだ……。
念のため尋ねるが、故障や設計不備の可能性はないのだね？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_078<tab>Positive. I've tweaked and adjusted and replaced every single piece, but it refuses to function as intended. I'm on the verge of tossing the blasted thing over the edge! What do you make of this, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_078<tab>ああ、いろんな調整を試したけど、問題は見当たらなかった。
あたしはもう、すっかりさっぱりお手上げさ……。
何か意見があるなら、聞かせてくれないかい？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_Q3_000_000<tab>What do you make of it?
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_Q3_000_000<tab>なんと答える？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_A3_000_001<tab>I don't think the compass is broken.
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_A3_000_001<tab>故障なんてしていない

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_A3_000_002<tab>Something may have happened to the Void Ark...
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_A3_000_002<tab>魔航船の状態が関係している……？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_A3_000_003<tab>I haven't the slightest idea.
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_A3_000_003<tab>さっぱり思い付かない

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_080<tab>Yes, I am inclined to agree. Judging by your previous work, it would seem unlikely that the compass itself is defective. We must consider other factors.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_080<tab>うむ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿の言う通り、
ウタタ殿の腕前を信頼し、故障はしていないと考えるべき。
羅針盤は正常だという観点で、他の要因を疑ってみよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_085<tab>Yes, the cause may indeed lie outside the compass itself. We must consider this dilemma from a broader perspective.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_085<tab>……羅針盤の故障ではなく、外的要因を疑うというわけか。
なるほど、視点を変えてみるというわけだな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_090<tab>Hmmm. If you are unable to detect any defects with the compass, then it is unlikely that <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> or I could do so either. Mayhap we should consider this dilemma from a broader perspective.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_090<tab>うむ、羅針盤の機構について、
我らが思い当たることなど、とうにウタタ殿が検討済みのはず。
何か気付いておらぬ、外的要因があるということか……？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_095<tab>Might you explain to us the principle by which the ectocompass tracks the Void Ark?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_095<tab>その「雲風の羅針盤」なるものは、
どのような機構に基づいて、魔航船を追っているのだね？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_096<tab>It all comes down to aetheric signature. I discovered that the Void Ark is encompassed by an energy of rather peculiar composition, so I simply tuned the compass to follow its unique trail.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_096<tab>あたしが観測した、特殊なエーテル波形を追うようにできてる。
魔航船の纏うエーテルが、かなり独特な波形をしていたんで、
そいつを記録して、羅針盤で追えるようにしたんだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_097<tab>An energy of peculiar composition, you say...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_097<tab>……なるほど、魔航船の纏う特殊な波形のエーテル、か。
特殊なエーテル……魔航船…………もしや……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_098<tab>Of course! The ark was propelled by the siphoned energies of voidsent! Could it be that the compass was tracking not the vessel itself, but the aether of the entities imprisoned within?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_098<tab>魔航船は、動力として妖異の魔力を利用していた……！
羅針盤が追っていたのは、魔航船そのものではなく、
内部に潜んでいた「妖異のエーテル」だったのではないか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_099<tab>That would certainly explain why the compass now points in a different direction than one would expect! After all, Diabolos and the Shadow Queen are no longer on board the ark!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_099<tab>そう考えれば、示す方角が違うのにも合点がいく……！
ディアボロスや女王スカアハは、もう魔航船の中にはいない。
羅針盤が奴らに反応していたのなら、指針が変わるのも当然！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_100<tab>...Are you implying that if we plotted a course based on the readings from the ectocompass, we would arrive on the demon's doorstep...so to speak?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_100<tab>……ちょ、ちょっと待てよ。
ってことは、この雲風の羅針盤に従って航空すれば、
妖異どものところにたどり着く、ってこと！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_101<tab>Just so, Mistress Utata! Assuming my theory is correct, we no longer require outside assistance to pursue our elusive quarry!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_101<tab>そのとおりだ、ウタタ殿！
この推測が正しくば、私たちだけでも妖異を追うことが叶う！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_102<tab>Oh, Stacia! What perfect timing! You won't believe the wonderful discovery we've just─
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_102<tab>おお、スタシアか！
リンクパール通信とは、ちょうどいいじゃねえかっ。
すごいぞ、あたしたちの大発見を聞いておくれよ……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_103<tab>Talon airships have been spotted en route to our nest! If it's revenge they're looking for, we'd best head back and make ready for them!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_103<tab>た、大変だよ！！
ラドリアの手下の飛空艇が、アジトに向かってるらしい！
この前の仕返しかもしれない……いそいで戻ろう！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_105<tab>I'm glad you're here, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but I don't think they're spoilin' for a fight...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_105<tab>戻ってきてくれたのね……。
今のところ、彼らに交戦の意思はなさそうよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_106<tab>It would not appear that these pirates have come with murder and pillage in mind. Quite the opposite, in fact...they seem rather bedraggled and beaten.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_106<tab>どうやら、戦闘や略奪行為をしに来たわけではなさそうだ。
ふぅむ……随分と疲弊しておるようだが……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_107<tab>I don't like this, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Why have the Talons come here without their captain? Where is Radlia?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_107<tab>なーんか、妙だね。
「大鷲連合」の親玉、ラドリアの姿が見当たらないぞ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SUBORDINATE02204_000_108<tab>We made it, thank the gods...
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SUBORDINATE02204_000_108<tab>……な、なんとか……ここまで来れたか。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SUBORDINATE02204_000_110<tab>Truce, Redbill! We need your help to save Captain Radlia!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SUBORDINATE02204_000_110<tab>乱鴉のレオファード、あんたに頼みがあって来たんだ……。
どうか姐さんを……ラドリア姐さんを助けてくれ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_111<tab>You... You're one of Radlia's favorites. You threaten my crew, steal our compass, and now you come crawlin' to me for help? What kind of unholy mess have you cretins stumbled into?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_111<tab>お前、「大鷲連合」の主力部隊のひとりだったな。
俺たちから「雲風の羅針盤」を奪っといて、助けろとは……。
……お前ら、いったい何をしでかした？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SUBORDINATE02204_000_112<tab>Aye, we took your damn compass, but it didn't show us to the ghost ship. We ended up at some moldy, old ruins, lousy with voidsent...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SUBORDINATE02204_000_112<tab>……俺らは、あんたから奪った羅針盤が示す先へ向かっていった。
そして辿り着いたのは、見たこともねえ古ぼけた遺跡……。
だが、そこには恐ろしい妖異が待ち構えてやがったんだ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SUBORDINATE02204_000_113<tab>Before we knew it, some sort of spider demon was knockin' our ships out of the sky. The two of us managed to pull away, but we saw what happened to them as got caught on the ground... If the captain survived the massacre, she's stuck there with no wings to fly out again.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SUBORDINATE02204_000_113<tab>蜘蛛みてぇな妖異に襲われ、飛空艇が次々と撃墜されて……。
俺らのフネはどうにか回避できたんだが、上空から見えたのは、
まさに大虐殺……ラドリア姐さんも、行方知れずに……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_114<tab>Why don't you give that linkpearl a listen, Captain? Might be as we can learn if Radlia is alive or dead, at least.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_114<tab>……ねえ、あなた、奪われた羅針盤に、
盗聴用のリンクパールを仕込んでいたはずよね……！
それを使えば、ラドリアがまだ無事かわかるんじゃない？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_115<tab>...Ugh, so much buzzin'. Can't hear a blasted─ Wait. I'm gettin' some words...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_115<tab>…………くそ、雑音が酷いな…………。
いや、待て…………何か聞こえてきた……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_116<tab>“They're after...Mhachi artifact. Damn demons are searchin'... Hide!”
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_116<tab>「マハの遺物……狙われている……
　奴らも……探して……妖異から、隠れ…………！」

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_117<tab>...And then a bunch of screamin'. Seems Radlia's still kickin' for now, but who knows for how long.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_117<tab>…………最後は、悲鳴でおしまい、だ。
どうやら、まだラドリアは生きているみたいだが……
それも、いつまで保つかはわからんな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_118<tab>If those screams were an act, then consider me fooled─I don't think the Talons are layin' a trap here.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_118<tab>あの悲鳴が演技だとしたら、奴は相当な役者だ。
こちらを騙す芝居って可能性は、だいぶ下がったが……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_119<tab>I've half a mind to leave Radlia to her fate, but I never turn my back on an adventure! Especially when the scent of treasure is in the air, eh? Now, tell me where you found these ruins!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_119<tab>えらく虫のいい話だが、知らない仲でもない……。
なにより……妖異が狙う「マハの遺物」とやらも気になるしな。
さあ、お前らが妖異に出くわした場所を吐けや！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SUBORDINATE02204_000_120<tab>...You'll help us, then!? You're a good man, Redbill! We left the captain in the Yafaem Saltmoor, just northwest of Mor Dhona.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SUBORDINATE02204_000_120<tab>……お、おおお！　ありがてえ、恩に着る！！
場所はモードゥナから北西に向かった先、「ヤフェーム湿地」。
姐さんは、そこにあるマハの遺跡に向かってた！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_121<tab>In Yafaem, you say!? Then you must speak of the ruined shell of Mhach itself! ...By Shatotto's black heart! Could they be after the Nullstone?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_121<tab>なっ！　我が故郷、マハの廃墟に！？
そんな……まさか奴らは、封じられた「要」を狙って……？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_122<tab>What's that, puss? You think you know what those fiends are after?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_122<tab>……どうした、ネコじじい。
お前、妖異が狙ってるブツに、心当たりがあるってのか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_123<tab>Right. Utata, see that these Talons are patched up, then have the <var 1A 02 /var>Raimille<var 1A 01 /var> ready to fly. And don't spare the oil─you know I love to hear her purr.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_123<tab>ウタタ、「大鷲連合」の連中を手当してやれ。
そのあとは、俺の「レミーユ」号の整備を任せた……。
大事な愛機だ……念入りに頼むぜ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_124<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Stacia. Bring the furball to my quarters, and we'll have ourselves a chat about our impendin' trip to old Mhach!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_124<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>とスタシアは、
ネコじじいと一緒に、俺の部屋へ来い……。
改めて状況を整理して、今後の対策を立てる！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_130<tab>You know, we've never been friendly with the Talons, but that don't mean we can just sit back and let them be torn to shreds by cacklin' voidsent.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_130<tab>「大鷲連合」とは、敵対することのほうが多いわ……。
でも、妖異たちに襲われていると聞いてなにも感じないほど、
知らない仲でもないのよねえ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_135<tab>I never imagined Diabolos would seek to enter the old city. Ah, but I should have suspected as much when I learned that the floodwaters had receded and left Yafaem exposed...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_135<tab>まさか、敵がマハの都市を目指していたとは……。
いや、ヤフェームが湿地帯として残っていると聞いた時点で、
予想すべきだったか……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SUBORDINATE02204_000_140<tab>P-Please! You have to rescue the captain!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_SUBORDINATE02204_000_140<tab>た、頼む！　どうか姐さんを……
ラドリア姐さんを助けてくれ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_145<tab>When Leofard asks me to pay special attention to his airship, that's a sign he's fully committed to his next adventure! He had the same spark right before he left to board the Void Ark.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_145<tab>レオファードが、愛機を念入りに整備しろって言うときは、
それだけ、次の飛行計画に気合を入れてる証拠なんだ！
魔航船に挑んだときにも、おなじ事を言われたよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_146<tab>...You're wondering why his ship is named “Raimille”? Hm. I never gave it much thought, but I'd wager it was the name of his first love...or maybe it was a pet!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_UTATA_000_146<tab>……なんで愛機の飛空艇が、女性の名前なのかって？
うーん、あんまり気にしたことなかったけど……
もしかして初恋の人の名前とか……なーんてね！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_150<tab>Right, furball. Let's hear about this artifact that Diabolos is lookin' for.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_150<tab>かつて魔法都市「マハ」が存在した場所、ヤフェーム湿地……。
あそこに、妖異どもが狙うブツが眠ってるってか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_151<tab>...If I am to speak of the Nullstone, then I must first explain the method by which Mhachi sorcerers would bind the voidsent into service.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_151<tab>……それを話すためには、まずマハの魔道士が、
いかにして妖異と契約していたかを説明せねばなるまいな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_152<tab>The more powerful the voidsent, the more difficult it is to manifest its presence in this world. Their own immense strength weighs them down like an anchor, you see, preventing them from breaking the surface of our dimension.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_152<tab>高位に座する大妖異ほど、こちらの世界への顕現は容易くない。
その強大すぎる力が枷となり、次元の境を通過できんのだよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_153<tab>And that is why they “cooperate” with mortal sorcerers. A mage can provide a suitable vessel for the summoning, or rip a large enough hole in the fabric of reality for the entity itself to step through.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_153<tab>そのため、妖異召喚を行う魔道士の「協力」が必要となる……。
召喚の依代を準備したり、次元の境に大穴を穿ったりと、
妖異が、こちらの世界に現れるためのお膳立てをするのだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_154<tab>...And let me guess: the mage forces the voidsent to agree to a pact in return for the invitation into our world?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_154<tab>なるほどね……。
こっちの世界に招待してあげる見返りとして、
妖異に契約を強いる……ってことでしょ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_155<tab>That is correct. But it would be foolhardy to expect such devious and malevolent creatures to abide by the spirit of even the most carefully worded contract.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_155<tab>……その通りだが、相手は危険な妖異。
願いを聞き届けるという口約束を結んだとて、
奴らが、本当にその約束を果たす保証などはない。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_156<tab>Thus did the Mhachi magi construct an occult device that would more securely bind the voidsent to their will─a safeguard of sorts, that to the best of my knowledge yet lies entombed within the remnants of the ancient city.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_156<tab>ゆえにマハの魔道士は、そうした妖異の裏切りに備えて、
奴らを契約で縛るための「要」となる魔具を造りあげた……。
その「要」は、今もマハの遺跡に眠っているはず。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_157<tab>The Nullstone was seen as a last resort! Should a voidsent break its pact and turn on its summoner, the mage could use the relic to disperse the very essence of even the most potent entity, obliterating it completely.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_157<tab>「要」は、マハの魔道士にとって、いわば安全装置……！
もしも召喚した妖異がこちらに従わず、敵意を示したとき、
魔道士は「要」を用いて、妖異を完全に「消滅」させるのだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_158<tab>I can't see the “royals” of the void takin' too kindly to a threat like that. Seems those sorcerers were just as ruthless as the monsters they summoned.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_158<tab>……「要」で脅しをかけて、大妖異どもを従えるわけか。
マハの連中も、えげつねえ手段を取ったもんだな。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_159<tab>When it came to the glory of Mhach, the ends justified the means...
In any event, we can be certain that Diabolos seeks to secure the Nullstone before it falls into mortal hands, and thereby ensure that Scathach will reign unopposed.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_159<tab>すべては、マハの繁栄のために行った所業……。
ともかく敵の狙いは、人の手に渡る前に「要」を奪取し、
女王スカアハに、真の自由を与えることであろう……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_160<tab>All right, so we know what the fiends are after. But what I don't understand, is why such a valuable relic was left behind when the mages knew a colossal flood was on the way.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_160<tab>……敵の狙いはそのとおりだろうが、解せねえな。
当時マハには、第六霊災という未曾有の大洪水が迫っていた。
なのに何故、貴重な「要」を都市に残した？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_161<tab>Its value was the very reason they chose not to risk its relocation. The Nullstone is kept within a structure constructed for the purpose, secured behind powerful wards and protected by deadly guardians.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_161<tab>貴重だからこそ、あえて残したのだよ。
「要」を安置している施設は、強固な封印で守られている。
管理を任された守護者たちとともにな……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_162<tab>And with the rising of the waters, they reasoned that the artifact would be sunk along with the city, far beyond the reach of vengeful voidsent.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_162<tab>洪水により、都ごと海の底に沈めば、
それこそ、妖異たちにも手出しできなくなる。
封印から取り出し、移動させる方が危険と判断したのだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_163<tab>But now that Yafaem is more swamp than sea, the demons only have the wards and the guardians to deal with. And I doubt they'd be wastin' their time down there in the mud if they didn't have some trick to break through the wards.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_163<tab>問題は、その封印とやらが、どれほど保つのかだな……。
妖異どもがヤフェームに降り立ったとなれば、
封印を解く術があると見るべきだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_164<tab>Aye, this's become a race to see who can nab the treasure first─which is just the sort of contest a sky pirate lives for!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_164<tab>マハに眠る「お宝」をどっちが先にいただくのか……。
実に、俺たち空賊向きの話になってきやがったな！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_165<tab>So we slip into the ruins, pinch the relic, then rescue Radlia right from under the fiends' noses!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_165<tab>こちらも、ヤフェーム湿地に乗り込んで、
妖異たちから「要」をかっさらい、ラドリアを助けだすのね！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_166<tab>...Well, I suppose we <var 1A 02 /var>could<var 1A 01 /var> save her while we're pokin' around for loot.
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_166<tab>……ま、ラドリアの救助は、「要」を探すついでだがな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_167<tab>I'll grab the new compass from Utata so we know where we're goin'. Check your weapons, pack your smallclothes, and meet me out by the landin' when you're ready to fly!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_167<tab>雲風の羅針盤をウタタが作りなおしてくれたんで、
俺らも妖異を追って、ヤフェーム湿地へ飛べるはずだ。
心の覚悟を決めた奴から、飛空艇の発着場に集合しろ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_170<tab>So, all we need to do is rescue Captain Radlia from a mob of nasty voidsent, then retrieve a dangerous artifact from the magically defended ruins of an ancient civilization. Easy, eh...?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_170<tab>「要」も手に入れる、ラドリアも救い出す。
同時に、ふたつの目的を完遂させることになるわ。
困難な仕事になりそうね……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_175<tab>I shall join you in this endeavor to recover the Nullstone. Though after fifteen hundred years, I wonder what remains of the city I once knew...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_175<tab>「要」を取り戻すべく、私も同行させてもらう。
マハに、1500年のときを経て降り立つことになるな……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_180<tab>We'll fly directly to Yafaem from here. Once we arrive, you forge ahead with your band of adventurers as you did on the ark, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Just keep slicin' into the depths until you reach that Nullstone.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_180<tab>現地へは、ここから飛空艇を使っていく。
お前は前回と同様、冒険者たちを率いて先陣を切ってくれ。
目的は、マハの「要」が眠る、遺跡の最深部への到達だ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_181<tab>Hmmm. We don't want to risk gettin' knocked out of the sky like the Talons, so we'd best land a little ways out from the ruins and head in on foot.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_181<tab>妖異どもが待ち構えていることを考えれば、
空から一気に遺跡まで到達しようってのは危険すぎる……。
手前の湿地帯で船を降ろして、徒歩で進んでいくぞ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_182<tab>The furball says he knows the place well enough to guide you, so me and the Redbills will follow behind on rescue duty. You concentrate on smashin' a path through to the artifact─we'll check the nooks and crannies for Radlia and her crew.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_182<tab>なんでも、最深部まではネコじじいが先導できるそうだ。
ラドリアや生存者の捜索は、俺の方で受け持つんで、
お前たち冒険者は、最深部を目指すことだけ考えればいい。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_183<tab>Don't let your guard down once you reach the ruins, though, eh? There's likely golems and such in there what are worse than the fiends outside, and we wouldn't want our hero losin' <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> head now, would we?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_183<tab>……ただし、遺跡に辿り着いてからも油断するなよ。
妖異から「要」を守るため、守護者も目覚めているはずだからな。
荒事には慣れっこだろうが……気ぃ抜くんじゃねえぞ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_190<tab>Your job is to carve a path to the vault where they keep the Nullstone. The Redbills will come in behind, and scour the area for Radlia and her crew...and whatever shiny baubles we can get our greedy hands on.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_190<tab>目的は、マハの「要」が眠る、遺跡の最深部への到達だ。
ラドリアや生存者の捜索は、俺の方で受け持つんで、
お前たち冒険者は、最深部を目指すことだけ考えればいい。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_200<tab>...So this is the heart of the ruins, eh?
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_200<tab>……ここが、遺跡の最深部か。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_201<tab>You've done a fine job dismantlin' the defenses, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I only wish we could say we had the same success, but Radlia and her Talons were nowhere to be found.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_201<tab>あなたたち冒険者は、素晴らしい成果を上げてくれた。
その功績につづきたかったけど、生憎こっちは空振り……。
ラドリアは、まだ見つかっていないわ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_202<tab>Yes, it is quite distressing, but we must focus on claiming the prize at hand. The Nullstone is ours!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_202<tab>その女の生死よりも、今は「要」の確保が肝要……。
すぐに仕事に取りかかるぞ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_FERDIAD_000_203<tab>(-???-)Mwahahahaha! You've left me such an <var 1A 02 /var>inviting<var 1A 01 /var> trail of destruction to follow!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_FERDIAD_000_203<tab>(-？？？？-)ヒャヒャヒャ……ヒャーヒャヒャヒャ！
ここまでの案内、ご苦労サマ……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_FERDIAD_000_205<tab>Well, well, well! If it isn't the adventurer I've so longed to dismember! Praise Lord Diabolos for this opportunity─I shall gift him your head in gratitude. Ah, and speaking of gifts, I've brought a present to celebrate our gleeful reunion!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_FERDIAD_000_205<tab>ウフフ、ずーっと切り刻んでやりたいと思っていた冒険者……。
こうして再会できるとは、ディアボロス様に感謝だネ。
再会を祝して、このフェルディア様が土産を持ってきたヨ……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_FERDIAD_000_210<tab>I see you've found the relic, then. Wonderful! Lord Diabolos will be so pleased! And look here! I've brought you a gift as thanks for all your hard work!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_FERDIAD_000_210<tab>なるほど、それが「要」カ……。
君らのおかげで、ディアボロス様の命令を果たせそうダ。
案内のお礼に、このフェルディア様が土産を持ってきたヨ……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_FERDIAD_000_215<tab>This <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> the lovely lass you've been oh-so-desperately seeking, isn't it? Unless you wish to see her rent limb from limb, then you will hand over the Nullstone!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_FERDIAD_000_215<tab>ネェ……君たち、この女を探していたんだロウ？
女の命が大切ならば……その「要」をヨコセ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_216<tab>You think I care about her worthless limbs? That woman's done naught but cause us grief, and I just thought to crow over her grave!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_216<tab>勘違いも甚だしいな、おふざけボケ妖異！
その女は、俺らに何度もチョッカイ出してくる厄介者でね。
この機会に、引導を渡してやろうと探していただけさ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_217<tab>Don't give me that look, Radlia. What? You thought I was here to <var 1A 02 /var>save<var 1A 01 /var> your sorry hide?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_217<tab>おいおい、その顔はなんだ、ラドリア。
俺は、お前を出し抜いたことはあっても、
助けてやったことなんざ、一度もないはずだが……？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_218<tab>You've never been aught but an obstacle to me. Do you remember the first time we met? You were roarin' with laughter at the sight of all them Allagan relics until I used your pretty blonde head as a steppin'-stone!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_218<tab>出し抜いたといや……はじめて会ったときもそうだったな！
アラグの石ころを前に高笑いしてる金髪女の脳天に、
でっかい靴跡つけてやったときは、痛快だったぜ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_RADLIA_000_219<tab>Damn you, you selfish bastard! And damn me for expecting you to act any different! If I had my weapons, I'd blow a bloody hole in your belly!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_RADLIA_000_219<tab>こっ、こんのぉ人でなしがぁ！！
一瞬でもアンタにすがったアタイが馬鹿だった！
今すぐ、その土手っ腹に風穴開けてやる！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_220<tab>Have you forgotten how awful a shot you are? Not much of a threat when I've seen you miss the side of a cathedral at ten yalms.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_220<tab>てめえの銃の腕前を思い出してからほざきな。
10ヤルムの至近距離で、狙いを外したこともあるくせによ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_FERDIAD_000_221<tab>Silence, you grinning fool! You've ruined my moment, and now I'll ruin your smirking face!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_FERDIAD_000_221<tab>……ええい、貴様、戯言もいい加減にシロ！
貴様の、そのにやけた顔面から切り刻んでヤル！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_222<tab>Now, puss!
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_222<tab>今だ、ネコじじい！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_FERDIAD_000_223<tab>What─ Aaargh! It burns!
target: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_FERDIAD_000_223<tab>ヌウッ！　グ……グアア……こ、この光ハ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_224<tab>This world is not your stage, unholy harlequin! Begone from our realm!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_224<tab>道化の妖異よ、この世界は貴様の遊技場ではない！
我らの世界から、消え失せろ！！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_FERDIAD_000_225<tab>Grrr! A clever farce, mortals! But the show is not over...not until you scream!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_FERDIAD_000_225<tab>グ、グウウ……！　貴様ら、このボクを欺くトハ……。
この屈辱、絶対に忘れないヨ……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_226<tab>...The bugger got away. And I think we'd best do the same.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_226<tab>……逃げたみてえだな。
俺らも、とっとと退散すんぞ。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_230<tab>Aye, it all worked out in the end, but I've had just about enough of Leofard's folly.
...Ugh, I must've said that a hundred times by now.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_STACIA_000_230<tab>上手くいったから、いいようなものの、
レオファードの無茶は、もうコリゴリよ……。
……ってボヤくのも、これで何回目かしら……ハァ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_235<tab>The lady pirate is saved, and the Nullstone is ours! That all went rather well, did it not?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_235<tab>「要」も我らの手に入り、女空賊も救助できた。
此度の成果は上々と言ってよかろう！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_240<tab>Now that was some excitement, wasn't it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Probably a little too much for Radlia, but we gave her a bed to sleep off the worst of her ordeal. She'll likely be back to her usual cheerful self in no time.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_240<tab>よし、どうにか無事にマハの遺跡から脱出できたな！
ラドリアは、ひどく憔悴してたんで休ませている。
ま、命に別状はないだろ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_241<tab>Quite a successful jaunt, all told. You and me, we make a pretty good partnership!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_241<tab>というわけで、見事に作戦は成功さ。
さすが、「レッドビル」と<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>だな！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_242<tab>...But I've got words for you, furball! You said that relic would obliterate a voidsent “completely.” Seems to me that foppish fiend just got scorched before he slipped away.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_242<tab>……けっ！　おい、ネコじじい。
なーにが、妖異を完全に「消滅」させるだ。
あのボケ妖異、普通に逃げていったじゃねえか。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_243<tab>Oh, that? That was scarcely a fraction of the Nullstone's true power. Once I have learned how to unleash its full potential, such demons shall be consumed like gnats caught in a bonfire.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_243<tab>ふん、「要」の本来の力を、あの程度と思うでないぞ？
力を使いこなす術を突き止め、全力を発揮させることが叶えば、
あのような下劣な妖異に遅れなど取らぬわ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_244<tab>So you're tellin' me our secret weapon ain't ready for battle? You might as well be wieldin' a blunted sword...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_244<tab>つまり、今すぐは全力を出せないってことじゃねえか。
まったく、中途半端なもんだぜ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_245<tab>Might I remind you that this “blunted sword” stung our foe sufficiently to free the lady pirate? A result we could not have achieved with your blustering words alone!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_CAITSITH_000_245<tab>貴様、その「中途半端なもん」のおかげで、
囚われていた女空賊を救い出せたことを忘れるなよ？
貴様の口先八丁だけでは、今回の成果はなかったのだぞ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_246<tab>Bah, I was ready to flee without Radlia if things took a turn for the worse.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_246<tab>……ま、あのままラドリアを見捨てて逃げちまっても、
俺らに不利益はなかったんだがな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_247<tab>...But you're right. You had the presence of mind to take advantage of my bluff, and it was your actions that saved her in the end.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM201_02285_LEOFARD_000_247<tab>…………だが、あの状況でよく俺の意図を読み取った。
確かに、ラドリアを救えたのは、お前の手柄だ。
